##Reading data
```{r}
retail.raw <- readLines("http://goo.gl/FfjDAO")

```

```{r}
typeof(retail.raw)
head(retail.raw)
tail(retail.raw)
```

```{r}
retail.list <- strsplit(retail.raw, " ")
names <- paste("Trans",1:length(retail.list),sep ="")
library(car)
rm(retail.raw)
str(retail.list)
retail.trans <- as(retail.list,"transactions")
summary(retail.trans)
```

```{r}
retal.rules <- apriori(retail.trans,parameter = list(supp=0.001,conf =0.4))
```

```{r}
library(arulesViz)
plot(retal.rules,interactive = TRUE)
```
